decisions: Fully desaturated palette from blue-tinted to neutral (hue 0, saturation 0%)
Background hierarchy: 4%→5%→7%→8%→10%→12% for panel differentiation through shade
Borders at 13% lightness with /50 opacity — barely perceptible hairlines
ResizableHandle bg-border/50 at rest with hover reveal
150ms ease transitions on all interactive elements globally
6px webkit scrollbars with auto-hide, matching dark theme
Simplified empty states to bare icon + text, removed all boxy containers
result.summary: Phase 9 Design Polish: Transformed from blue-tinted shadcn default to native macOS IDE aesthetic. Desaturated entire palette (hue 224→0), darkened backgrounds (5%/7%/4%), ultra-subtle borders (13% with /50 opacity), refined all components. 20 files modified, 0 created. All checks pass.
